data.event: Melody Vess and Brian Reams married in June 2008.

event.title: arose about the grant in August 2008

data.event: CSEPP Public Information Officer Monica French said questions arose about the grant in August 2008, shortly after CSEPP Program Coordinator Mark Klaas and Kentucky Department of Emergency Management Director Brig. Gen. John Heltzel took over.

event.title: go in and inventory everything now

The audit shows in May 2008 a purchase request was forwarded from Reams to the fiscal court for the purchase of parts and maintenance in the amount of $9,996.15.
